attributes.action: Return to the good laws and customs of Henry I.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Because the country is in such a poor and down-trodden condition, weighed down by unnecessary laws and taxation, we petition our prime minister to return to the good laws and customs from the time of Henry I and in the process removing many great evils from the land. We mean this is no humourous way. Returning to such good customs is the only way our noble kingdom can be saved.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
